blogPost.excerpt: Binaryx introduces a new cryptocurrency token especially designed for St. Valentine's Day. Use SVDT tokens to memorize your names and Valentine’s day wishes 👩‍❤️‍👨 Also, get a chance to win travel to Dubai, Apple Watch 6, Apple AirPods Pro and more 💰
blogPost.body: Binaryx introduces a new cryptocurrency token especially designed for St. Valentine's Day. Use SVDT tokens to memorize your names and Valentine’s day wishes 👩‍❤️‍👨 Also, get a chance to win travel to Dubai, Apple Watch 6, Apple AirPods Pro and more 💰
blogPost.title: St. Valentine's Day Token - Memorize your names and Valentine’s Day wishes
blogPost.author: Dan Zaitsev

localize.description: Binaryx推出一款新的加密货币代币，特别为圣情人节设计。使用SVDT代币记住你的名字和情人节祝福❤️👨同时，还有机会赢得迪拜旅游、Apple Watch 6、Apple AirPods Pro等💰。
localize.tagline: 记下你的名字和情人节的愿望

localize.description: Binaryx推出一款新的加密貨幣代幣，特別爲聖情人節設計。使用SVDT代幣記住你的名字和情人節祝福❤️👨同時，還有機會贏得迪拜旅遊、Apple Watch 6、Apple AirPods Pro等💰。
localize.tagline: 記下你的名字和情人節的願望

previous.excerpt: Browse beautiful color schemes, optimized for backgrounds, borders, and more. Search for your perfect swatch for your project/design. Or, simply use our scheme generator! 🚀
previous.title: Colortopia - The easiest way to find colours

localize.description: 浏览美丽的配色方案，针对背景、边框等进行优化。为您的项目/设计搜索您的完美色板。或者，简单地使用我们的方案生成器 🚀
localize.tagline: 寻找颜色的最简单方法
